title: Cross Road: In Their Cases - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Based on an Anime   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists
author: Makoto Shinkai   Naruto Kiriyama
description:
“It’s not that I want to find happiness, nor am I looking to be promised something definite.”

“What I want is more than that- To find a place somewhere out there, far away.”

“To find the place where I want to be.”

Miho, a girl who is still undecided on her future after graduation.

Shouta, a boy who still longs for his estranged father.

Both are in their third year of high school, leading completely different paths in life. But before long, their paths will cross, amid this little drama called the entrance exams…>
